name: Format
description: Consider Face-to-face: all teaching sessions provided on-site, Online: all teaching sessions provided online, Hybrid: teaching sessions provided simultaneously on-site and online, and Blended: teaching sessions provided either on-site or online.

name: scheduling
description: Consider the type of activities as Scheduled: participants are required to attend at a specific time, and Unscheduled: participants can attend at their own pace.
